FaveIT

Business Concept

Problem

People have multiple wish lists across different platforms and struggle to keep them organized, often forgetting where they saved what or for which occasion.

Gift-giving is often inefficient and leads to duplicated or undesirable gifts because friends and loved ones don’t have visibility into others’ preferences.

Solution

Build a digital platform that helps users keep their wish lists in one place and makes it easy to share them with friends and loved ones.

Main features

  • Users create faves - desired items - by pasting urls from any webshop or add them manually by taking pictures in stores
  • Users can group faves into collections
  • Users can share their faves or collections with friends and loved ones
  • Users can search through their friends faves and collections that were shared with them to find the perfect gift for the perfect occasion

Relevant Links

Figma designs

Architecture

Current

  • React Native with Expo for the frontend
  • Atomic design for the components
  • State management with Redux Toolkit and Redux Saga
  • Supabase for the backend - authentication and data storage

    • Planned

    • Build equivalent web app so users are not restricted to iOS and Android stores
